00016 struct DBBatchInfo {
00017     DBBatchInfo(std::string const& _key, std::string const* _pstring) : key(_key), pstring(_pstring) {}
00018     DBBatchInfo(std::string const& _key, google::protobuf::Message const* _pmessage) : key(_key), pmessage(_pmessage) {}
00019 
00020     std::string key;
00021     std::string const* pstring = nullptr;
00022     google::protobuf::Message const* pmessage = nullptr;
00023 };
00024 
00025 class LevelDBManager : public lsf::basic::Singleton<LevelDBManager> {
00026 public:
00027     LevelDBManager() : _db(NULL) { }
00028     ~LevelDBManager() { delete _db; }
00029 
00030 public:
00031     bool Init(size_t leveldb_cache, std::string const& leveldb_path);
00032     bool Has(std::string const& key);
00033     bool Query(std::string const& key, google::protobuf::Message& message);
00034     bool Query(std::string const& key, std::string& content);
00035     bool Update(std::string const& key, google::protobuf::Message const& message);
00036     bool Update(std::string const& key, std::string const& content);
00037     bool Delete(std::string const& key);
00038 
00039     bool BatchUpdate(std::vector<DBBatchInfo> const& batch_ops);
00040 
00041 private:
00042     leveldb::DB* _db;
00043 };
